@baliziom43
This problem is in language file after installation of additional languages (czech etc...) - missing tranlation for Launcher! There are two solutions for your problem... 

1. Start game with Witcher2.exe from BIN folder!
2. Rename file cz0.w2strings to en0.w2strings (rename original file as you want for backup) and then in configurator set language to EN! Game will be now in czech (for example), but Launcher still in English... :)
